articles.title: Thailand must prepare for more dangerous EV-A71 HFMD virus, warns virologist - The Star Online
articles.description: BANGKOK (The Nation/Asia News Network): Enterovirus A71 (EV-A71), which causes hand, foot and mouth disease, can also cause severe neurological diseases like meningitis, a top virologist warned on Saturday.

articles.title: Taiwanese singer Yu Tian on daughter's battle with cancer: 'She begged me to let her go' - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: His 38-year-old daughter, who is also a singer, has been battling colorectal cancer for the past eight years. The mother of two suffered three relapses and has undergone almost 70 rounds of chemotherapy treatment.

articles.description:
Asian Insider looks at the reasons for the surge in prices and how people are coping.

articles.content:

articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: AirAsia X Bhd (AAX) posted a net loss of RM652.51mil, or loss per share of 157.30 sen in the fourth quarter ended June 30.

Revenue for the quarter stood at RM107.18mil.
